title: Can't connect to the PBE
body: I'm stuck on authenticating on PBE account i need help pls

replies.body: Your network settings might just need a little update to be able to get a cleaner signal with those login servers. Change your Port Forward and DNS settings following those steps outlined in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that helps or not.
